text: Ara yara imana eneche tara bale -- ''ekati sura kena abatirna haya na?â€™â€™ Kinta yakhana ekati sid'dhantamulaka sura abatirna haya ara tate yud'dhera ullekha thake takhana yadera hrdaye byadhi rayeche tadera tumi dekhate pabe tomara dike takacche mrtyura karane murcchita lokera drstira n'yaya. Sutaram dhik tadera jan'ya
